title: password storage
extract: A password manager is typically a software application or a hardware device that is used to store and manage a person's passwords and strong passwords. Typically all stored passwords are encrypted, requiring the user to create a master password to access all managed passwords.
extract_html: A password manager is typically a software application or a hardware device that is used to store and manage a person's passwords and strong passwords. Typically all stored passwords are encrypted, requiring the user to create a master password to access all managed passwords.
